Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
how do i redeem the $500 ad credit from clickbank?

To redeem your $500 ad credit on NewsBreak, follow these steps:
1. Access the Billing Section in your NewsBreak account.
2. Under Ad Credits, click on ‘Add ad credits.’
3. Choose ‘Customize’ and enter the total value of your gifted ad credit, plus at least $1. For example, if your gifted ad credit is $500, your total should be a minimum of $501 or more.
4. Enter the promotional code provided by ClickBank.
5. Provide your credit card information and check out.
Please note that it's not possible to combine multiple ad credits at this time. If the cost of your campaign exceeds the ad credit balance, you'll need to cover the remaining amount with a valid credit card linked to your account.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to redeem a NewsBreak ad credit](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17391456255629-How-to-redeem-a-NewsBreak-ad-credit).
